title: Kanfig
description: Kanfig is a web based platform that allows teams to build, clone, and deploy production ready environments across multi-cloud infrastructure—without engineering overhead. Ideal for streamlining DevOps, governance, and infrastructure consistency.
tech_used: GitOps , Docker & Kubernetes, Managed cloud services, Automated reconciliation engine, Opinionated Platform
success_stories:
Build and clone production ready environments in minutes.
reducing setup time and human error.
Accelerated developer workspace provisioning through GitOps based workflows.
Built-in governance, drift remediation, and audit trails improve reliability and maintainability.

title: Nimbledox.ai
description: Nimbledox.ai is a cutting-edge IDP solution designed to automate the extraction, interpretation, and processing of data from over 50+ document types. It transforms unstructured and semi-structured files into structured, actionable formats, closely replicating how humans read and process documents
tech_used: Optical Character Recognition, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning, AI-based workflow
success_stories:
Achieved 80% reduction in manual document processing time
Improved 95% data accuracy

title: CoeusCoder
description: CoeusCoder is an AI-driven platform that automates Hierarchical Condition Category (HCC) coding using NLP and machine learning, significantly reducing manual effort while maintaining compliance and accuracy.
tech_used: NLP & Machine Learning, Optical Character Recognition (OCR), EHR Integration, Cloud-based SaaS (HIPAA compliant)
success_stories:
Reduced manual HCC coding effort by 60%.
Improved coding accuracy by 30%.
Achieved up to 3× faster throughput.
Processed 70,000 medical charts in 1.5 months in a combined human–AI workflow.

title: FinSight AI
description: FinSight AI leverages predictive analytics and machine learning to provide real-time fraud detection and risk assessment for financial institutions, reducing losses and improving compliance.
tech_used: Predictive Analytics, Machine Learning, Real-time Data Processing, Cloud APIs
success_stories:
Reduced fraud losses by 45% in the first year.
Enabled real-time risk scoring for over 1 million transactions per day.

title: EduBot
description: EduBot is an AI-powered virtual tutor that personalizes learning paths for students, provides instant feedback, and automates grading for educators.
tech_used: Natural Language Processing, Adaptive Learning Algorithms, Chatbot Frameworks
success_stories:
Improved student test scores by 20% on average.
Saved teachers 10+ hours per week on grading and feedback.

title: RetailVision
description: RetailVision uses computer vision and AI to optimize shelf stocking, track inventory in real time, and analyze customer behavior in retail stores.
tech_used: Computer Vision, IoT Sensors, Deep Learning, Edge Computing
success_stories:
Reduced out-of-stock incidents by 35%.
Increased sales by 12% through optimized shelf placement.

title: HRMatch
description: HRMatch is an AI-driven recruitment platform that screens resumes, matches candidates to job descriptions, and automates interview scheduling for HR teams.
tech_used: Resume Parsing, Machine Learning, Automated Scheduling, Cloud SaaS
success_stories:
Reduced time-to-hire by 50%.
Improved candidate-job fit and reduced manual screening workload.

title: SupplyAI
description: SupplyAI optimizes supply chain logistics using AI-powered demand forecasting, route optimization, and real-time tracking for manufacturers and distributors.
tech_used: Demand Forecasting, Route Optimization, Real-time Tracking, AI Analytics
success_stories:
Reduced delivery times by 18%.
Lowered logistics costs by 22% for enterprise clients.
